Name: Triplicity
About the game: Traverse a stylized world, solve puzzles and defeat the guardians of Triplicity Island in a fast paced collectible card game. You are given a starting deck of cards and work your way though various challenges. Challenges consist of a combination of evolving block puzzles and NPC encounters. New cards are rewarded for completing matches, win or lose. Build new decks, defeat the guardians, solve puzzles and become a Triplicity Champion! - 180 different named cards, each of which can have bonus abilities amounting to 1000+ unique cards. - 9 worlds, 80+ puzzles - Full deck editor for creating custom decks - NO BUYING CARD PACKS! Get cards by simply playing the game - Practice matches against NPCs to get new cards and test new decks - Standard and Draft tournaments - Hidden bonus cards
